name: The 1000 Floor Challenge
description:
1000 floors

3 difficulties

This game was a challenge from a member of FB Group.

This game was done within 1 week or more accurately under 48 hours.

Unpolished, Unbalanced, Not optimized, Not exciting.

BUT it fulfilled the challenge.

Try to enjoy the 1000 floors grind.

License:

What you can do:

1. Play the game.

2. Make a backup

3. RPGMaker MV users can open the project and see/learn how it was done.

What you can not do:

1. Sell or Rent the game or any part of it.

2. Use any part of the game in a questionable, political, illegal content or agenda.

The license will be updated as required.

PS:

I might update this later. Depends on constructive criticism and polite feedback.

Or USD 1000 motivation.  XD
